abitofchiptune.name: A Bit of Chiptune - Collaborative Album
abitofchiptune.description: Wrote and produced an electronic song which was published [on spotify](https://open.spotify.com/track/5o9gDy0mGR2FWkxjm07fFv?si=cc1a6351e2784b3e) and on [bandcamp](https://abitofchiptune.bandcamp.com/track/something-you-can-eat).

riseandstrike.name: Rise and Strike
riseandstrike.description: Created a fighting game in Gamemaker Studio 2, then playtested it, then polished it. Screenshake, camera zoom, and particles galore.

nixos.name: NixOS Configuration
nixos.description: Designed a desktop user interface using build scripts written in [nix](https://nixos.org). The configurations for all supported programs (which include Spotify, Firefox, multiple terminal emulators, and Discord) inherit properties like color, border-radius, and fonts from a single configuration file.

insectoiddescent.name: Insectoid Descent

preview.alt: A dimly lit top-down shooter game

insectoiddescent.description: Composed music and pixel art animations, wrote dialogue, designed fonts, and wrote design docs for *Insectoid Descent,* a top-down shooter with haunting ambience and thrilling gamefeel.

3drenderer.name: 3D Renderer

preview.alt: A computer generated cube lit by a white light.

3drenderer.description: Wrote the [learnopengl.com](https://learnopengl.com) project from memory. A from-scratch 3D renderer written in C++.
